import React, { Component } from 'react' import SelectFilter from './select' import AddArticle from './addArticle' import toggleDecorator from '../decorators/toggleDecorator' import logo from '../logo.svg' import ToggleCreate from './toggleCreate' import ToggleSelect from './toggleSelect' class Header extends Component { state = { isHidden: false } toggleHidden () { this.setState({ isHidden: !this.state.isHidden }) } render(){ const { handleClickSelect, handleClickAdd, isOpen } = this.props return(

FOR THE VOICE

1910-1920

FOR THE VOICE

AVANGARD RUSSIAN BOOK

ASSOCIATIONS, GROUPS AND PUBLISHING HOUSES

{this.state.isHidden && } {this.SelectComponent}
) } } export default toggleDecorator(Header)
